alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:11PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Autauga, east central Perry and northeastern Dallas Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 611 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Valley Grande, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selma, Valley Grande, Selmont-West Selmont, Gardner Island, Paul M Grist State Park, Memorial Stadium, Burnsville, Dallas County Horse Arena, Potter Station, Summerfield, Craig Field Aiport, Valley Creek Junction, Selma Drag Strip, Edmund Pettus Bridge, Selma University and Barrett Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
